attributes.action:
Change the credit scoring system.
Its not true to real life.
attributes.additional_details:
To give people opportunities to buy property and get on the housing ladder.
If people do not pay for their homes or cars then there should be consequences eventually.
6 years on a credit file is too long.
People's finances can change within 1 year.
Covid 19 is going to ruin a lot of people's finances; Job loses and relationships.
The system needs to change as its not a true reflection on life. Not everyone with bad credit missed payments purposely.
attributes.background:
The credit score system is not true to real life situations.
Defaults and CCJs currently remain on your file for 6 years. It should be moved to 3 years.
Companies do not look at your wages & outgoings. Just a score that may have been ruined by redundancies, relationship breakdowns and now covid19.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the work of credit agencies.
